title: [Random Request] FFFFOUND Invites??
content:
I’m looking for an invite to sign up on this site, and I don’t know of anyone registered already off-hand so I figured I’d ask around on the graphic-related forums that I frequent. For those of you who have no idea what I’m babbling about, here is what [**FFFFOUND!**](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202055757/http:/ffffound.com/) is about...
FFFFOUND! is a web service that not only allows the users to post and share their favorite images found on the web, but also dynamically recommends each user’s tastes and interests for an inspirational image-bookmarking experience!!
_Examples of tagged images:_ - [**Image A**](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202055757/http:/objectsinspaceandtime.com/~/fish/sb/shit/tipsfordesignerswhowanttobeffffound00.gif) - [**Image B**](http://web.archive.org/www.slanted.de/images/lisa01.jpg) Anyway...check it out, if you haven’t already. I would be most appreciative to anyone willing & able to give me an invite! Thanks, Amanda [‹ Establishing a commercially viable foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202055757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50980 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dr. Rudolf Wolf's Life. Memphis designer....... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202055757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51381 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pr3ciousroy

comments.content: I think each member is only getting one invite, so they’re scarce, for sure.
I heard it was 3 invites per each member, but I could be wrong?

oh, almost forgot...

Please hit me up on AIM, if you can help me out!  
my screenname is: **pr3ciousroy**

Hello everyone there, maybe any of you got the ffffound invite? would like to be invited please! Got lots of images I would like to share with the community. Thank you!

-Ponchosquealº
